alert.note: Alert for Delaware; Hardin; Union (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 02 at 1:58AM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF NORTHWESTERN DELAWARE COUNTY IN CENTRAL OHIO, HARDIN COUNTY IN WEST CENTRAL OHIO AND NORTHEASTERN UNION COUNTIES IN CENTRAL OHIO THROUGH 230 AM EDT... At 158 AM EDT, strong thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Ada to near Prospect, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Kenton, Ada, Richwood, Forest, Dunkirk, Alger, Radnor, Blanchard, Mount Victory, Mcguffey, Patterson, Dola, Grant, Delaware State Park, Huntersville, Pfeiffer, Hepburn, Mentzer and Essex. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
